example.description: Creates a new case in the AWS Support Center. Values for the -ServiceCode and -CategoryCode parameters can be obtained using the Get-ASAServices cmdlet. The value for the -SeverityCode parameter can be obtained using the Get-ASASeverityLevels cmdlet. The -IssueType parameter value can be either "customer-service" or "technical". If successful the AWS Support case number is output. By default the case will be handled in English, to use Japanese add the -Language "ja" parameter. The -ServiceCode, -CategoryCode, -Subject and -CommunicationBody parameters are mandatory.
